newsitem.title: USA: Applied Digital sees $1.6 mln Q2 charge.
newsitem.headline: Applied Digital sees $1.6 mln Q2 charge.

text.p: Applied Digital Access Inc said Wednesday it would take a $1.6 million charge in the second quarter from research and development costs from its acquisition of Northern Telecom Ltd's Digital Support System II operations system software product.

Applied Digital said in a news release that it had completed the acquisition, for which it will pay Nortel a net $3.1 million in cash and/or stock. Applied Digital also issued Nortel a warrant to buy 150,000 Applied shares at $12 each.
Nortel retains the right to support its Digital Support System II customers outside North America.
Applied Digital provides network performance management products to telecommunications companies.
